entry.title: ‘To do things they hadn’t even thought of’: Senior Turing Scholar publishes second computer science research paper | Department of Computer Science

link.title: ‘To do things they hadn’t even thought of’: Senior Turing Scholar publishes second computer science research paper | Department of Computer Science

entry.summary: Computer Science and Mathematics senior Alan Baade really enjoys spending hours on problems.Especially the particularly hard ones, he said. Spending 40 hours on one equation with a small break for sleep somewhere in the middle is rewarding to him.“I think it's because you can tell at the end of this you are going to understand the material,” Baade said. “You're going to understand computers.”
